67A7354D4F62B6943F1E50A335B8A1FC=[1]3010년, 울프 용기병대는 블랙웰 산업과 접촉하여 이미 유명했던 머로더의 설계를 채택하고 이를 100톤급 강습 메크로 개조했다. 기존의 설계도를 바탕으로 작업을 진행함으로써 설계에 소요되는 공정이 단축되었고, 약 2년 후에 용기병단의 제타 대대에 납품할 수 있게 되었다. 오리지널에 약간의 변경만을 가한 사실이 이 메크의 강력한 무장이 조금도 손상되지 않았음을 의미한다. 아틀라스와 동등한 중량의 장갑을 갖추고 점프 젯이 추가된 이 메크를 전장에서 목격한 적은 두려움에 떨게 될 것이다. 현재 블랙웰은 울프 용기병대와 독점 계약을 체결하고 있지만, 많은 군사 부대에서 보다 광범위한 무기 시장으로의 판매를 요구하는 목소리가 나오고 있다. 매우 드문 경우지만, 용기병대 이외의 장소에서 목격되는 경우도 있다.
D4CDB23A43084FFCAECF83B94306379B=[2]3010년, 울프 용기병대는 블랙웰 산업과 접촉하여 이미 유명했던 머로더의 설계를 채택하고 이를 100톤급 강습 메크로 개조했다. 기존의 설계도를 바탕으로 작업을 진행함으로써 설계에 소요되는 공정이 단축되었고, 약 2년 후에 용기병단의 제타 대대에 납품할 수 있게 되었다. 오리지널에 약간의 변경만을 가한 사실이 이 메크의 강력한 무장이 조금도 손상되지 않았음을 의미한다. 아틀라스와 동등한 중량의 장갑을 갖추고 점프 젯이 추가된 이 메크를 전장에서 목격한 적은 두려움에 떨게 될 것이다. 현재 블랙웰은 울프 용기병대와 독점 계약을 체결하고 있지만, 많은 군사 부대에서 보다 광범위한 무기 시장으로의 판매를 요구하는 목소리가 나오고 있다. 매우 드문 경우지만, 용기병대 이외의 장소에서 목격되는 경우도 있다.

94824ADD42056E9E4E2E8CB8706AFF78=[94]'사이드와인더'는 반란그룹인 크림슨 인크리네이션의 리더인 프란슨 경의 개인 배틀메크 였습니다. 그가 사망한 후에도 그의 추종자들은 그의 '메크'를  회수하고 짧은 시간 동안이지만 계속 사용할 수 있었습니다. 드래곤의 대부분의 표준 구성은 장거리 무기를 선호하고 속도를 사용하여 거리를 유지하지만 사이드와인더는 더 빠르고 더 강력한 단거리 공격이 가능하도록 개조되었습니다.
99AEA9E34C61D15F06B270B0D195141B=[95]'스페이드의 여왕', '죽음의 퍼스트 레이디', '블랙 위도우'는 나타샤 케렌스키에게 붙여진 호칭중 일부에 불과합니다. 살아있는 전설인 울프 드라군에서 활약한 그녀의 업적은 이너스피어 구석구석에 알려져 있으며, 많은 사람들이 그녀를 현존하는 가장 치명적인 멕워리어라고 말하고 있습니다. 그녀가 머라우더를 현상금 사냥꾼에게 잃었다는 이야기는 잘 알려져 있으며, 전 세계의 모든 바에는 고유한 버전이 있습니다. 뉴델로스의 활활 타오르는 숲을 돌진하는 블랙 위도우 컴퍼니의 검은 맥에 관한 이야기는 워낙 유명하기 때문에 나타샤의 칠흑 같은 워해머를 보기만 해도 전쟁터에서 도망치는 적도 많았습니다.

C63E6C6142B3C1DDB0CE3AA8F741086D=[419]1.
0868EF8947B7B1281A11439F64DFA55F=[420]1. Drag the Blueprint Actor to a level<cf>2. Define a StaticMesh to be cloned along the spline - at Actor Details Panel<cf>3. Add new points by selecting one, then ALT + drag<cf>4. Move /rotate /scale the spline control points using the Transform Gizmo<cf>5. Scale the whole system using Actor Scale Transform.<cf>6. Tweak spline curvature at Actor Details / Size Adjustment<cf><cf>7. TAG the spline Actor and provide the tag to ninja.<cf>    A sim Output Material will be assigned to the SplineMesh in runtime, using this tag

F582D3DE4252812513141D939304810F=[1794]3039년 전쟁에서 전과를 올린 재커리 마일스 '호크' 호킨스는 라이란 멕워리어 중 한 명으로 소속되어, 이후 첨단 신형 강습 메크를 '선물'로 받는다 . 그는 바로 자신의 '마울러'가 사실은 치명적인 설계 결함이 있는 악명 높은 다보쿠 라는 것을 알게 된다. 탄약이 폭발했다고 스스로 판단해 조종사를 강제사출시키는 결함이있는 CASE 시스템과 장갑 패널을 재설계하는 것이 불가능하다는 것을 알고, 그는 재설계 대신 이를 무력화하는 작업에 착수했다. 사출 시스템의 작동이 수동으로 제한되어 '녹아웃'에 대한 우려를 떨쳐버릴 수 없었기 때문에 그 이름이 되었다.

4018BCF74AD9F27BC50A84B6D85A15ED=[1799]1차 계승권 전쟁의 참화를 겪은 카펠라 대연방국은 배틀메크가 절실히 필요했다. 세레스 메탈은 이 난제에 도전하여 2826년 저렴하면서도 견고하고 대량 생산이 가능한 메크을 공급했다. 빈디케이터는 속담에 나오는 낙타처럼 '위원회가 설계한 짐승'으로, 여러 가지 역할을 적절히 수행하지만 어느 것 하나 뛰어나지 않다. 빈디케이터는 좋은 점프 성능, 적당한 장갑, 적당한 열효율을 가지고 있으며, 지속적인 장거리 교전에 적합한 플랫폼이다.

F79AA7DC48F2F2C9832D2A90BA8588B2=[2280]Another 'Mech down!
7002CA584FF659C97E947984A1ED307F=[2281]Another Clan redesign of an iconic Inner Sphere design, the Hunchback IIC takes everything it does to the extreme. Slow for a ‘Mech its size and lacking in both ammo and armor, the Hunchback IIC is considered a death sentence for all who pilot it. However, if the Hunchback IIC manages to close with its enemies, the extreme firepower it carries is enough to eradicate even the toughest opponents. 10BBC1714F6AF16C9459C59B826FF9A4=[2552]아처라는 이름에서 알 수 있듯이, 이 기체는 장거리 지원형 메크에 대한 테란 제국의 요구를 충족시키기 위해 2458년에 개발되었다. ARC-2R의 생산 개시는 배틀메크의 실전 투입으로부터 불과 30년 후였음에도 불구하고, 아처는 이너 스피어 영역에서 가장 많이 생산된 섀시의 하나로 자리매김했다. 잘 무장하고 적절한 최고 속도를 갖춘 아처는 적을 장거리에서 묶어두는 데 탁월하지만, 조종사는 고강도 근접 전투 중에 과열될 위험이 있습니다.

169E83BD4D1B10E7910BD480D0B82169=[2561]그리핀은 거대한 메크와 그 후 생산된 소형 정찰 메크 사이의 틈을 메우기 위한 기체로 설계된 메크 중 하나이다. 2492년의 롤 아웃 시에는 매우 선진적인 설계라고 생각되고 있었다. 정찰 유닛의 기동성과 중량급 메크의 화력 및 장갑을 갖춘 이 어스워크스제 기체는, 단기간에 전장에서 확고한 지위를 확립하게 되었다. 시간이 지나면서 더욱 새롭고 고급 섀시가 생산 라인에서 출하되기 시작하면서 그리핀은 이동형 화력 지원 유닛으로 더 특수한 임무를 맡게 되었다.

8896386B49C05A7097EE329C3B64415D=[2948]Baron Oliver Kincaid's life was filled with remarkable ups and downs. His posting with the prestigious Free Worlds Guards, his dishonorable discharge and stint as a mercenary before eventually, many years later, working his way back around to being able to show his face at the Marik Court. During his time as a mercenary serving with Nik's Cavaliers, he gave his BattleMech a name, 'Agincourt'. When prompted to explain the name, he replied that it was there to remind him how powerful turns of fate can be, and to work hard to earn back what he once had. As far as what it's armed with, a search of the cockpit found a note attached under the weapons list that read 'kitchen sink'.

5E75AB5B4E57EE4708741FAE33AE8403=[3747]Called upon to produce an effective light ’Mech for city fighting, Orgus Industries replied with the UrbanMech in 2675. Cheap to produce and potent in its assigned duties, the ’Mech was manufactured in large numbers until the destruction of the Orgus Industries production lines, though many survived the Succession Wars. While extremely slow - not just for a light 'Mech but for any 'Mech - the UrbanMech is notable for its unique 360-degree torso turn ability, giving it a decisive edge in urban combat.
B96316C146356FED1412B18E6DC0604B=[3748]Called upon to produce an effective light ’Mech for city fighting, Orgus Industries replied with the UrbanMech in 2675. Cheap to produce and potent in its assigned duties, the ’Mech was manufactured in large numbers until the destruction of the Orgus Industries production lines, though many survived the Succession Wars. While extremely slow - not just for a light 'Mech but for any 'Mech - the UrbanMech is notable for its unique 360-degree torso turn ability, giving it a decisive edge in urban combat.

2E937188426009D24D2138942E53FBDD=[3950]Clan Ice Hellion embarked on a tall order, building a light 'Mech for the invasion that would be able to replace the venerable Mist Lynx. Completed in 3037, the Clan Ice Hellion factory used to create the Arctic Cheetah was conquered by Clan Smoke Jaguar and folded into the Jaguars' primary invasion force. When House Kurita defenses first encountered it, the Arctic Cheetah was given the code name Hankyu, or "Short Bow." Five tons heavier than its predecessor, the Arctic Cheetah is faster, has more armor, better scouting equipment, and boasts more firepower than the Mist Lynx.

3E9E282F414F6D7E4AA98C819862060F=[4405]2650년 성간 연맹에서 특수 작전 부대용으로 의뢰받은 스파이더는 처음에는 대량 생산되지 않았습니다. 2776년 생산 시설이 파괴되면서 스파이더를 제작할 수 있는 수단과 지식도 함께 사라졌고, 예비 부품을 약탈하는 일이 흔해졌습니다. 자유 세계 동맹(Free Worlds League)이 테란 헤게모니(Terran Hegemony) 유적에서 원래 설계 도면을 발견한 후 스파이더의 섀시를 부활시켰고, 이후 이너 스피어 지역에서 흔히 볼 수 있게 되었습니다. 스파이더는 경무장이지만 놀라운 기동성을 자랑하며, 매우 높은 고도에서도 점프할 수 있는 뛰어난 정찰 메크입니다.

8E190F314F9D1B559CBB8697C939F030=[4753]커체블의 기후는 극지방 근처에 거의 영구적인 소금 폭풍을 일으킵니다. 일반적으로 특정 경도를 지나면 인간이 거주할 수 없게 만들죠.

0A0BE5944D6CEA1647A049ACA9FC72C3=[4755]Court martialed for conspiring with Kittery resistance groups to lead his Davion command into a Liao ambush, an enraged Justin Allard directly insulted First Prince Hanse Davion and the New Avalon court claiming his trial was unfairly biased against him due to his half Capellan heritage. Expelled from the Federated Suns and adopting his mother's maiden name 'Xiang,' Justin entered the gladiatorial Solaris 7 games with the intent of publicly humiliating Hanse Davion at every opportunity with his now infamous Yen-Lo-Wang. Justin Xiang would eventually become the 3027 Solaris 7 champion after killing the reigning champion Philip Capet.
E99B598A4B198F2F1BBA5E9006A8BB19=[4756]Court martialed for conspiring with Kittery resistance groups to lead his Davion command into a Liao ambush, an enraged Justin Allard directly insulted First Prince Hanse Davion and the New Avalon court claiming his trial was unfairly biased against him due to his half Capellan heritage. Expelled from the Federated Suns and adopting his mother's maiden name 'Xiang,' Justin entered the gladiatorial Solaris 7 games with the intent of publicly humiliating Hanse Davion at every opportunity with his now infamous Yen-Lo-Wang. Justin Xiang would eventually become the 3027 Solaris 7 champion after killing the reigning champion Philip Capet.

C2972DFE4AFD88F8E66181A82BEBB680=[5201]Data Caches found in this 'Mech's battle computer identify it as a long lost 'Hellslinger'. This 'Mech was specially made to compete in the Star League Martial Olympiad's Hades event. Taking place outside a terraforming dome on Venus, the special Hades event saw competitors fight each other until their 'Mech was downed or the blistering heat forced them to shutdown. While not originally a unique design, the destruction of the Venus terraforming domes in the centuries since the fall of the Star League likely makes this Hellslinger the last of its kind.

50B1E10D415F39E22DA6679CC56C52B7=[5497]Developed less than a year before the invasion, Clan Diamond Shark had hopes for the Huntsman as their totem OmniMech. Recognizable by the almost shark-like fin on the top of the ‘Mech, the Diamond Sharks lost the designs for this ‘Mech in a trial against Clan Nova Cat. With it went their hopes for a totem ‘Mech that could carry them through the invasion of the Inner Sphere.Instead, their prized design became Clan Nova Cat’s premier medium 'Mech. 9AF0BA35466A81685F41CAA11068BAA1=[5815]During the opening waves of REVIVAL, Clan Smoke Jaguar was not the only Clan making ‘Mech advancements in 'Mech designs based on their encounters with the Inner Sphere. The Night Gyr was Clan Jade Falcon’s answer to growing combat needs for a gunboat that spared no expense against the numerically superior forces of the Inner Sphere. Much slower than the average Clan heavy ‘Mech, the Night Gyr achieves its supremacy by sheer firepower. Each configuration exists for a specific task and is guaranteed to leave destruction in its wake.  Although its lack of speed would be seen as a detriment against Clan opponents, it maintained a top speed equivalent to the average Inner Sphere designs of the time.

507695CA4154C8B5034ED38B7DB486A4=[6012]미션으로 배치된 메크의 섀시마다, 해당 섀시의 메크 경험치를 획득할 수 있습니다. 이 곳에서 메크 경험치를 사용하여 섀시에 해당하는 모든 보유 메크를 미세 조정하고 전장에서의 성능을 향상시킬 수 있습니다.
4FB545084C4C4A4E02E496997BDCA547=[6013]각 메크에는 자체 조종석 모델과 배치가 있습니다.
3B56A262494C33810F49ADA530016336=[6014]각 스타에게 전역에서의 작전을 맡길 것이다. 그들이 공격하면, 우리는 즉각 동시 공격을 개시하고 이어서 바로 사령관 메크를 표적으로 삼을 것이다.
D1D454E04CD319B0090845AB1B249985=[6015]각 스타에게 전역에서의 작전을 맡길 것이다. 그들이 공격하면, 우리는 즉각 동시 공격을 개시하고 이어서 바로 사령관 메크를 표적으로 삼을 것이다.
F5F9BB534F98C158D7F34F9E8DF0ECFA=[6016]각 조종사는 자신의 성격을 반영하는 맞춤형 페인트 작업을 했습니다. 여기서 재규어 멕 워리어가 신경 헬멧에 사용한 무늬들을 볼 수 있습니다.

7C597DFE424170F5BF7017A52A36B4E6=[6029]초기 헌트리스 컨셉 아트
C0046BB144C65B899A276985188F002C=[6030]초기 바이옴 컨셉 탐구
F9377D72417C125F12FB5D9A563655D8=[6031]개발 초기에는 산 속의 격납고 기지가 가젤 드롭쉽이나 다른 소형 함선을 위한 항공우주 항구가 될 예정이었습니다. 하지만 의도한 게임 플레이에 비해 아레나가 너무 커서 실론 폭격기만 수용할 수 있도록 크기를 줄였습니다.
01A13E84456E71A0A828548FC48A677D=[6032]침공 초기에 바이퍼는 이너 스피어 군으로부터 드래곤플라이라는 이름을 얻었습니다. 마주친 다른 모든 메크보다 더 많은 점프 제트를 자랑하는 바이퍼는 빠르고 기동성이 뛰어나며 전장을 날아다닐 수 있었습니다. 이 크기의 메크에 비해 괜찮은 장갑에도 불구하고, 그 모든 움직임이 자유롭게 이루어지지는 않습니다. 바이퍼는 비슷한 무게의 다른 메크와 더 가벼운 메크에 비해 화력이 상당히 부족합니다. 그럼에도 불구하고, 느리고 의심치 않는 이너 스피어 대상에 대한 효과적인 타격 및 도주 전술을 여전히 수행할 수 있습니다.
09DBF9B44D8AA6C1C23F348A20310036=[6033]초기 방향은 주로 모든 생물 군계의 개성을 식별하는 독특한 실루엣을 포착하는 데 중점을 두었습니다. 여기에는 종종 산탄데르의 거석과 같은 독특한 지질 구조가 포함됩니다.

8CFF2CD44E6852D2B3B7B984D31E82BC=[6461]Experimental test type #5, or simply The X-5, was an effort by Gibson Federated BattleMechs to re-forge collected lostech scrap into combat ready 'Mechs. Despite GFBM utilizing the Cicada production lines at the same Gibson facility to cut down on R&D costs, re-adapting the ancient Star League tech and the lack of capabilities to manufacture replacement components saw the project's budget spiral out of control. GFBM eventually deemed the project non-viable, and mothballed the various prototypes. Of which, The X-5 proved to be the only battle-ready chassis produced.

0D503D414AE5339DE5D071B6CC20E789=[6898]성간 연맹용 기체로서 2633년에 처음으로 호리스 공업에 의해 생산된 기체가 바로 배틀마스터이며, 당시를 상징하는 기체가 중 하나니다. 그 혈통 덕분에 전체 창을 막는 것부터 여러 전초기지를 혼자서 파괴하는 것까지 작전 기록에 대한 많은 이야기가 전해집니다. 유서 깊은 과거를 가진 다재다능한 중전차로서 배틀마스터는 최고의 강습 메크로 간주되며 전장에서 무시무시한 힘을 발휘합니다.

02C8453B43A370F45ED4E48A7E6C8BF1=[6905]2499년에 처음 만들어진 로커스트는 5세기가 지난 지금도 여전히 가장 흔히 운용되는 배틀메크 중 하나입니다. 수년에 걸쳐 더욱 진보된 경량 메크가 여러 대 만들어졌지만, 로커스트의 속도, 지구력, 그리고 아마도 가장 중요한 매우 낮은 비용의 조합에 필적할 만한 것은 거의 없습니다. 이로 인해 이 유서 깊은 정찰병의 상당한 수의 변형이 생겨났지만, 종종 추가 무장은 장갑을 줄이는 대가로 이루어졌습니다.

14630548413BFD46F23155A33AFC5435=[6911]25세기 중반에 테란 제국에 의해 처음으로 실전 배치한 밴시는 원래 근접 전투 역할을 수행하도록 의도되었습니다. 그러나 전장에서의 성과가 좋지 않아 이너 스피어 전역에서 민병대와 훈련 사령부로 전락했습니다. 그러다 제3차 계승 전쟁이 시작될 때 이 기체가 다시 활성화되었습니다. 초라한 탄생 역사에도 불구하고 밴시는 동급의 다른 많은 메크를 능가할 수 있는 효과적인 직접 사격 슬러거로 존경을 받고 있습니다.

0EA7F58E412EFFFC1933519C5798159A=[6917]2491년에 처음 생산된 썬더볼트(또는 애칭인 T-볼트)는 이너 스피어 전역에서 흔히 볼 수 있는 존재일 것입니다. 행성 공격을 위해 설계된 최초의 메크 중 하나로, 두꺼운 장갑과 강력한 화력으로 유명합니다. 나중에 더 크고 진보된 디자인으로 대체되었지만, 썬더볼트의 뛰어난 디자인과 무시무시한 명성 덕분에 생산이 계속되었습니다.

C6B61E23463304AEA50FB29687D45444=[6929]3010년에 제조가 개시된 애더는, 이너 스피어에의 침공을 목적으로 설계되었습니다. 클랜 스타 애더의 전용 모델로서 제조되었음에도 불구하고, 애더는 매우 강력했기 때문에 모든 클랜에서 애더를 원했고, 이내 일반적으로 사용하는 경량 메크가 되었습니다. 이너 스피어 내에서의 코드네임은, 매복 잠재력으로부터 일컬어진 '퓨마'이다. 애더는 장갑이 두껍고, 경량 메크임에도 전투에서는 속도가 뒤떨어지지만, 정확하고 강력한 장거리 데미지를 입힐 수 있는 2문의 사거리 연장 PPC를 탑재한 초기 구성이 특징적이면서도 가낭 잘 알려져 있습니다.
60D9E7B44365CF95E9CAB4A7B3665708=[6930]2520년 처음 선보인 더비쉬는 사상 최초의 양산형 배틀 메크 중 하나입니다. 주된 역할은 장거리 화력 지원 플랫폼이며, 장비된 일련의 부 무장과 점프젯에 의한 높은 기동성을 자랑하며, 거리의 원근을 불문하고 적을 압박하는 것이 가능합니다. 다만 당연하게도, 압도적인 화력의 대가로서 비교적 장갑이 얇고, 냉각 시스템이 장시간의 지속 사격을 견딜 수 없다는 약점이 있습니다.

F40F70994BC9388DFA6E569885A66087=[7667]Grigori Kovalenko was a loyal Capellan who viewed the Federated Suns initial incursions into Capellan territory as a cowardly sneak attack. Unwilling to participate on any attacks against the Capellans, he abandoned the Twelfth Star Guards and offered his services as a mercenary to the Capellan Confederation. With the fall of Tikonov in 3029 Grigori took the theft of the Cataphract design and production as his new cause. Styling himself as a knight of old, and a quest to take back all Cataphracts from non-Capellans, he quickly salvaging one for his own use. Replacing his aging Centurion and dubbing it Ilya Muromets, after the legendary knight of Slavic myth.

354411DC406A8519A807C99D9BBAD1B8=[9542]라이플맨의 한정적인 성공을 재체 검토해 본 카론의 기술자들은 모두가 '장갑이 불충분하고, 탄약 수가 적고, 과열하기 쉬운 메크'라고 입을 모았습니다. 이들은 이러한 관찰 결과를 토대로, 예거메크의 설계에서는 라이플맨의 주요 단점을 다루면서 기체의 장점은 최대한 유지하려고 노력했습니다. 탄약 문제를 완화하고 소총의 열 부담을 거의 없앨 수는 있었지만, 장갑에 의한 메크의 보호를 강화하면서 같은 무장을 유지하는 방법은 아무래도 찾을 수 없었습니다. 그래도 종래의 2/3 정도라면 나쁘지 않은 성과라 할 수 있습니다. 어쨌든 그 설계로 조달 담당자에게 좋은 인상을 줄 수 있었기 때문에, 2774년에 예거메크의 생산이 개시되었습니다.

489E25B2423E16791E2C2FA0B2A22B80=[9654]Initially conceived by Clan Smoke Jaguar as a front-line OmniMech meant to phase out the Hellbringer as a 'Mech more suited to frontline combat. Unfortunately, entering service after the Jaguar Invasion Fleet left the Clan Homeworlds, the designers would make the most out of the missed opportunity by using the hard-earned experience gained fighting the Inner Sphere to further refine the design. With the Clans now returning to the homeworlds to elect a new ilKhan, it will soon be time to unleash the Ebon Jaguar on the unwitting Inner Sphere when the invasion once again resumes.

319D870E49B940A07A266BBA5C3351F2=[9707]2743년 성간 연맹의 황혼기 무렵에 도입된 킹 크랩은 한 번의 압도적인 일제사격으로 다른 베틀메크를 무력화시키거나 파괴를 가능하게 하는 강습 메크에 대항할 수 있는 기체라는 케렌스키 장군의 명령을 이행할 만큼의 성능을 가지고 있었습니다. 다른 강습형 메크만큼 두터운 장갑을 자랑하지는 않지만, 오리지널 킹 크랩과 그 후속 모델이 장착한 화력은 설계 사상에 있어서  메크의 역할을 훌륭하게 수행합니다.

04655BB243DD993DF70A72AD4F027259=[9812]Issuing a Starmate to advance will see them break formation and advance toward the ordered location, attacking any hostile along the way. Once they arrive at the designated position, they will enter a “guarded” stance, where they will stay in the vicinity of the ordered location, attacking any hostiles that enter their weapon’s range. They will remain in the “guarded” stance until given a new order. Use this order to establish support or sniper fire locations overlooking the battlefield.
5D052FCB49AD25A6B5CC65896CB0E710=[9813]Issuing a follow command will return the ordered Starmate to a “follow” state, returning them to their default behavior.

At some point in the 3rd Succession War, The Old Crows stole the Banshee from the Galedon Regulars for unknown reasons. Since then, the Old Crow's commander, known only as 'El Guapo,' took the 'Mech as his own and dedicating tremendous amounts of resources to upgrading and maintaining the 'Mech to fit his personal tastes.

053CD7A8412B349F4A21CA9922EAAFBB=[11212]Lucky 'Number Seven.' The infamous 'Mech of the once luckiest man in the Inner Sphere, Terry Ford. His former lance mates in the 9th Illician Lancers claim that Ford would regularly find himself in the thickest pockets of combat only for Ford to return to base without a scratch. Witnesses would also claim Number Seven would repeatedly take shots that would take down an Atlas only to walk it off as if nothing happened. Ford's luck eventually ran out when a failed Death From Above attempt saw Number Seven's gyro shatter causing the 80 ton 'Mech to collapse face first into the ground crushing Number Seven's cockpit, and Ford with it.

BAD69ACB418AC097C450BD954E8E0840=[11398]MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS 오리지널 사운드 트랙
F0819282465783CF60793AA699CFAA53=[11399]MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS - 디지털 콜렉터즈 컨텐츠에는 디지털 아트북, 전곡 수록의 사운드트랙, 옴니메크 기술 자료, 한정 컨텐츠의 플래티넘 멕 패턴, 특별한 무기 로드아웃과 스킨을 탑재한 팀버 울프-WAR 옴니메크가 수록되어 있습니다.
9DD5245D451BF67A1E4B869F0B9EC89A=[11400]MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS 침공 메크 패턴. 16개의 클랜 옴니메크에 대한 침공 메크 패턴을 잠금 해제하세요. 이 독특한 디자인으로 메크를 사용자 지정하고 전장에서 눈에 띄어 봅시다.

7D203C5749BEA08EA04551906F4090DB=[11620]마르테 프라이드
B89709C647321C91F466BAB62B327D74=[11621]Mary Tallman grew up around 'Mechs. Her father was a house Tech with the 22nd Avalon Hussars, and in her late teens, she built her own locust from spare parts. Being comfortable inside a 'Mech had its downside, and she chaffed under the classwork at NAIS, instead leaving and enlisting with the 22nd Avalon Hussars. With time two things became apparent, Mary was a competent officer and unlikely to see promotion past Company Commander. After 3 years with the Robinson DMM, she was offered her own command of the Bremmon Draconis March Militia, and quickly turned that troublesome unit around. An expert at atmospheric drops, it's no surprise Mary's 'Mech is one designed for planetary assault and her constant tinkering means that her Thunderbolt is anything but standard.

0628AC08441183C82139B59AAA33EACE=[12297]Named after an African trickster god of ancient Terra by the various militias attempting to bring it down, the Anansi terrorized the outer systems of the Federated Suns and Taurien Concordant for years in the name of Paula Trevaline and the Tortuga Dominions. While eventually shot down and recovered by the AFFS, its pilot managed to avoid capture and is still suspected to be hiding among 'Lady Death' Trevaline's inner circle on Tortuga Prime.
BCB2FF5E4226443F2891BDAD8C0229C3=[12298]Named for the largest trebuchet constructed on medieval Terra, Loup de Guerre was a gift to the young scion of the famous Chandlers of Tiber. Serving in the Regulan Hussars, Lieutenant Peter Chandler distinguished himself in battle on Tellmann IV. Discovering a Thunderbolt had broken through their defensive line and looting supplies, he promptly pounded the 'Mech to scrap. When asked why he'd engaged the much larger 'Mech alone his only comment was 'it was only what one should expect of a Chandler.'

2B55C0AB4E11FBB91942929583028B1F=[13507]원래 2665년 스타 리그를 위해 제작된 오우썸의 디자인은 오래된 STR-2C 스트라이크 메크를 기반으로 했습니다. 조상만큼 빠르지는 않지만, 배틀메크가 오우썸의 편대에 맞서기보다는 전장에서 완전히 은퇴하는 경우가 드물지 않습니다. 격렬한 교전에서 뛰어나며 종종 가장 중요한 목표를 확보하거나 적어도 적으로부터 그러한 목표를 보호하는 임무를 맡습니다.

1B1A481D414326F4BC9339A940440EF4=[13512]원래 2510년 지구 제국와의 방위 계약으로 제작된 빅터는 점프 기능이 있는 지원형 메크로 구상되었습니다. 피비린내 나는 재통일 전쟁 동안 스타 리그 방위군에 사용되었고, 나중에 리그 회원국에 설계가 공개되었습니다. 공격형 메크로는 매우 기동성이 뛰어나고 강력한 AC/20을 장착했지만 장거리 화력이 부족합니다.

0AE399B5471C2C901B3F57A0ED146EE5=[13517]원래 2475년에 발표되었을 때는 트루퍼라고 불렸지만, 결함이 잇따라 발생하면서 마침내 출시되었을 때 나쁜 평판을 피하기 위해 이름을 플리로 바꾸게 되었습니다. 플리는 특별히 빠르지 않고 인상적이지 않은 전투 능력을 가지고 있지만, 특별히 저렴하고 매우 작은 크기 때문에 맞추기가 답답할 정도로 어렵다는 장점이 있습니다.
E56217CC4CD0E154473C15BECBD9D0C8=[13518]원래 2475년에 발표되었을 때는 트루퍼라고 불렸지만, 결함이 잇따라 발생하면서 마침내 출시되었을 때 나쁜 평판을 피하기 위해 이름을 플리로 바꾸게 되었습니다. 플리는 특별히 빠르지 않고 인상적이지 않은 전투 능력을 가지고 있지만, 특별히 저렴하고 매우 작은 크기 때문에 맞추기가 답답할 정도로 어렵다는 장점이 있습니다.
44FE8F67443D03C52E8389BAB0DC3991=[13519]원래 정찰 부대를 위한 화력 지원 차량으로 구상되고 설계된 프로토타입 팬서는 2739년에 성간 연맹을 위해 처음 제작되었습니다. 2759년 세인트 존 전투의 재앙 이후, 성간 연맹은 설계를 재평가하여 대형 레이저를 PPC로 교체했습니다. 크기에 비해 느리지만, 장갑이 잘 되어 있고 강력한 타격을 주는 것으로 알려져 있어 다른 메크에 대한 훌륭한 지원 유닛입니다.

14D612E0477F01843335779594D7BC38=[13522]원래 코벤트리 금속 공방에서 당시의 다른 인기 있는 경량 메크와 경쟁하기 위해 설계한 코만도는 다른 정찰 부대가 마주칠 수 있는 모든 것을 쉽게 처리할 수 있는 약간 더 무거운 정찰병입니다. 그 성능에 감명을 받은 라이란 연방은 2486년에 코만도를 독점적으로 사용하기 위해 위임하여 섀시를 적의 손아귀에서 보호하는 데 필요한 모든 관료적 및 외교적 도구를 사용했습니다.

13E4E1C34CFA1DB6FBFC7A817AF9AF7B=[13527]2594년에 트라이어드 테크놀로지스에 의해 설계된 스토커는 200년 이상 이너 스피어 영역에서의 주력 강습 메크이며, 그 이전의 2세기에 걸쳐 성간 연맹 방위군에서 활약하고 있다. 스토커는 중량급 무기와 중량급 장갑을 조합한 강력한 메크이다. 속도가 빠르다는 불만은 전혀 나오지 않지만 멈추기가 쉽다고 주장하는 사람도 거의 없습니다.

E6F617E141C8C8DBE61A50845E29860D=[13531]Originally hailing from Trondheim, Signe Haugen was a moderately successful MechWarrior in the Solaris VII arenas. She was known as an early adopter of Defiance Industry's new 'Mech hatchet, in the form of the trench blade equipped to 'Scrapper', her customized Quickdraw. She could have had a lucrative future in the gladiatorial circuits, had she remained. However, when word reached her of a resistance movement in her homeland, to free the Rasalhague Military District of Draconis Combine control, she felt a sense of duty to her homeland and people, and departed Solaris with her 'Mech to provide the rebels with whatever aid she could.

74C2F3284E7B0FC374E2D8B1CB59E280=[14040]Port Damage
751CBF8B4E2F6CE490E2DDA5A90B0FC7=[14041]Portia 'Torrent' Ryan claims to be a relation of the famed pirate Redjack Ryan. Her timely interruption of an assassination attempt on Paula 'Lady Death' Trevaline quickly earned her the famed pirate's favor, as well as the command of Scourge Company. Obsessed with detail, Portia has served with distinction on several scouting missions along the Concordat border. Perhaps more distinctive however is her penchant for using her Firestarter to set off incredible conflagrations. Her obsessive nature is at work here too, as when these raging fires are viewed from above they bear a remarkable symmetry that some liken to works of art. Perhaps it's this artistic mayhem that caused her to modify her 'Mech, moving all the flamers into the arms for extra precision.

C6EF511F444E258D047D1190B58F5D9C=[14138]Prince's Champion
34F725574969EAE142F34D818670D155=[14139]Prior to becoming a MechWarrior, Jacoby Abioye was a starting quarterback for an American Football league within the Magistracy of Canopus. After the death of his grandmother Jacoby enlisted with her former unit, the 2nd Canopian Fusiliers. Never able to fully drop his love of the game, Jacoby renamed his inherited Hunchback Grid Iron. Although he would never live up to be anything more than an average MechWarrior, Jacoby's prior notoriety from his football career was leveraged by the Magistracy Armed Forces in various recruitment adds throughout the Magistracy.

208B23054343BE4F7FA4039AC6A33BA5=[14182]2801년에 생산이 시작되고 2845년에 라메인 II의 주요 공장이 파괴될 때까지 생산된 센츄리온은 이미 성공을 거두고 있던 트레뷰셋의 운영 파트너로서 코레안 엔터프라이즈가 설계 및 제조를 실시했다. 약 150년 간에 걸쳐 AFFS 라인 유닛에 예비 부품을 안정적으로 공급하고, 설계 전반의 성공과 따뜻한 환영에 밀려온 코레안 사는 3012년 뉴 아발론에 2차 생산 시설을 건설한다. 밸런스가 뛰어난 센츄리온은 같은 정도의 중량급 플랫폼의 대표격이 되고 있어, 압도적인 공격에 노출되어도 이것에 견딜 수 있는 강인함을 가지고, 천천히 꾸준하게 진군하는 것으로 알려져 있다.
8F4189AD4230132B36531A9976996B31=[14183]2801년에 생산이 시작되고 2845년에 라메인 II의 주요 공장이 파괴될 때까지 생산된 센츄리온은 이미 성공을 거두고 있던 트레뷰셋의 운영 파트너로서 코레안 엔터프라이즈가 설계 및 제조를 실시했다. 약 150년 간에 걸쳐 AFFS 라인 유닛에 예비 부품을 안정적으로 공급하고, 설계 전반의 성공과 따뜻한 환영에 밀려온 코레안 사는 3012년 뉴 아발론에 2차 생산 시설을 건설한다. 밸런스가 뛰어난 센츄리온은 같은 정도의 중량급 플랫폼의 대표격이 되고 있어, 압도적인 공격에 노출되어도 이것에 견딜 수 있는 강인함을 가지고, 천천히 꾸준하게 진군하는 것으로 알려져 있다.
A74524ED4779AD065667DD8F4C061F68=[14184]2801년에 생산이 시작되고 2845년에 라메인 II의 주요 공장이 파괴될 때까지 생산된 센츄리온은 이미 성공을 거두고 있던 트레뷰셋의 운영 파트너로서 코레안 엔터프라이즈가 설계 및 제조를 실시했다. 약 150년 간에 걸쳐 AFFS 라인 유닛에 예비 부품을 안정적으로 공급하고, 설계 전반의 성공과 따뜻한 환영에 밀려온 코레안 사는 3012년 뉴 아발론에 2차 생산 시설을 건설한다. 밸런스가 뛰어난 센츄리온은 같은 정도의 중량급 플랫폼의 대표격이 되고 있어, 압도적인 공격에 노출되어도 이것에 견딜 수 있는 강인함을 가지고, 천천히 꾸준하게 진군하는 것으로 알려져 있다.

59BE115743A79E498454C38B84F1374F=[14578]Raised among mercenaries her entire life, Rhonda Snord was born to be a MechWarrior. When she was a child, her father, Cranston Snord, was discharged from the Wolf's Dragoons accused of abandoning his post to hunt for ancient artwork. He would go on to form his own mercenary unit 'Snords Irregulars' and built up a reputation as a treasure hunter and historian of the ancient Star League, building a collections of preserved artwork and texts from humanity's lost golden age. Although itself a relic of the Star League, Rhonda's 'Heavy Metal' was a beast of her own creation. Sporting a distinct Pink camo scheme and mounting external stadium speakers, Rhonda used Heavy Metal to flood the battlefield with late 20th century rock and heavy metal music as she took to the field.

92A9B3494CB36DE06D28F3943DEAA095=[18098]The Archer piloted by Morgan Kell on that day in early 3016 has moved into the world of myth and legend. Determined to protect the lives and honor of the surrounded Kell Hounds mercenary regiment, Morgan Kell stepped forward in Tempest to sacrifice himself in single combat with enemy commander, Yorinaga Kurita, despite his Archer's obvious lack of close combat weaponry. But as the killing blow fell at near point blank range, Kell's 70 ton war machine emerged completely unscathed. Eyewitness accounts claimed that despite seeing the 'Mech with their own eyes, no computerized sensor detected the Archer's presence. As if the 'Mech was nothing more than a phantom. No credible explanation of the phenomenon has been put forward to this day.

6A2C9235432F3986ED65488CBF7632D8=[18104]블랙잭은 '반란진압과 화력 지원 기능을 갖춘' 새로운 배틀메크의 제작이라는 성간 연맹의 부탁으로 2757년에 탄생했다. 생산 요건을 충족하고 초기 테스트에서는 양호한 성적을 거두었음에도 불구하고 블랙잭은 부당하게 나쁜 평가를 얻어서 성간 연맹에 의해 각하되게 되었다. 원래 설계는 경량급 적과의 전투에 적합한 것이지만, 올바르게 조종한다면 매우 효과적인 위협이 될 수 있는 사거리과 지속 사격 능력을 갖추고 있다.
84DEFAF746E54F1FB5CB96924EB42EE7=[18105]블랙잭은 '반란진압과 화력 지원 기능을 갖춘' 새로운 배틀메크의 제작이라는 성간 연맹의 부탁으로 2757년에 탄생했다. 생산 요건을 충족하고 초기 테스트에서는 양호한 성적을 거두었음에도 불구하고 블랙잭은 부당하게 나쁜 평가를 얻어서 성간 연맹에 의해 각하되게 되었다. 원래 설계는 경량급 적과의 전투에 적합한 것이지만, 올바르게 조종한다면 매우 효과적인 위협이 될 수 있는 사거리과 지속 사격 능력을 갖추고 있다.

042B06AA4B9F03BC804583864A39A295=[18111]제 3차 계성권 전쟁 말기 몇 년 간 카펠라 대연방에서는 중 공격형 배틀메크의 부족이 심각했다. 캐터프랙트의 탄생은 그 수요를 맞추기 위한 것이지만, 유일한 캐터프랙트 생산 시설이 3025년에 가동한지 불과 몇 년만에 다비온 군에 빼앗겨, 그 직후에 적 수비대에 캐터프랙트의 존재가 들통나고 말아서, 카펠라의 자랑은 이내 당혹감으로 바뀌었다. 언뜻 보면 캐터프랙트는 무기와 풍부한 장갑의 조합에 의해 고중량의 배틀메크에 가능한 한 범용성을 갖추려 했던 프로토타입 시험기로 추정된다.

693DE10643AEB3C6E8046FA30C5E04AF=[18152]The Federated Suns units that encountered this new 'Mech were confused, mistaking it for a Charger. As the war of 3039 progressed, it became clear that the Hatamoto-Chi, the first 'Mech in the Hatamoto chassis line, was something entirely different. Clearly matching the capabilities of the old Star League era Thug Battlemech, it appears that the Hatamoto-Chi still came from the Charger mold, likely because it was just easier and faster to use the already running Charger assembly line. It does so to its benefit too, retaining the ease to repair that's one of the Chargers few praise points, as well as removing at least some of the stigma surrounding that old maligned design.

A14FC6634C94D71347729A9DD076E574=[18154]The Federated Suns units that encountered this new 'Mech were confused, mistaking it for a Charger. As the war of 3039 progressed, it became clear that the Hatamoto-Chi, the first 'Mech in the Hatamoto chassis line, was something entirely different. Clearly matching the capabilities of the old Star League era Thug Battlemech, it appears that the Hatamoto-Chi still came from the Charger mold, likely because it was just easier and faster to use the already running Charger assembly line. It does so to its benefit too, retaining the ease to repair that's one of the Chargers few praise points, as well as removing at least some of the stigma surrounding that old maligned design.
CC0ADCAD4986EB4FE7D394BD57D45D73=[18155]The Federated Suns units that encountered this new 'Mech were confused, mistaking it for a Charger. As the war of 3039 progressed, it became clear that the Hatamoto-Chi, the first 'Mech in the Hatamoto chassis line, was something entirely different. Clearly matching the capabilities of the old Star League era Thug Battlemech, it appears that the Hatamoto-Chi still came from the Charger mold, likely because it was just easier and faster to use the already running Charger assembly line. It does so to its benefit too, retaining the ease to repair that's one of the Chargers few praise points, as well as removing at least some of the stigma surrounding that old maligned design.

AFC4BB1545F90A96E87BB8A99D62AFA8=[18168]가고일은 이너 스피어에서 '맨 오 워'로도 알려져 있으며, 침공 내내 여전히 일반적으로 사용되는 메크입니다. 일반적으로 공격용 메크에서 볼 수 있는 역할과 반대로, 가고일은 극도로 빠른 속도로 전투에 돌입하고 그 크기의 메크에 비해 화력이 부족합니다. 적의 공격을 크게 견뎌낼 수 있지만 돌격을 이끌기 위해 중형 또는 중형 메크의 속도를 유지할 수 있는 가고일은 침공 명단에서 이상한 위치에 있습니다. 무기는 중형 메크와 유사하며 거의 모든 무기를 팔에 휴대하고 있어 무기를 벗기 쉽기 때문에 장기전에서 불리합니다. 이러한 단점과 더 작은 메크도 비슷한 목표를 달성할 수 있기 때문에 가고일이 그렇게 큰 플랫폼의 비용을 들일 가치가 있는지에 대한 추측이 있습니다. 이러한 우려에도 불구하고 가고일은 침공 중에 흔히 볼 수 있습니다.

912BDECD4F2FF9408FF0929082BABF11=[18177]The Hatchetman that would be known as 'Man-at-Arms' began life as one of the models the Lyran Commonwealth sent to the Federated Sun prior to the Fourth Succession War. It initially served with the Second NAIS Cadet Cadre where it received a number of refits and experimental equipment, including the newly rediscovered LB 10-X Autocannon. In 3038 it was transferred to Federated Suns' unit McKinnon's Company, 'The Fox's Teeth', and was assigned to veteran MechWarrior Austin Vorster. This was a substantial upgrade to the old STG-3R Stinger he had inherited from his late father.
4F6FBDE14895B6EA52047DA00071E42F=[18178]The Highlander known as 'Redshank' belonged to Roz Sheridan, a senior member of the independent mercenary command Dragon's Breath. The group is known for carefully shifting and balancing the large outstanding debt that they owe to several Lyran banks. This has not only resulted in them having to constantly take mercenary contracts, but their MechWarriors have become skilled marksmen so as to maximize the value of any battlefield salvage. Unfortunately for Sheridan and Dragon's Breath, the loss of 'Redshank' will only increase their debt.

DAB14C134DC1B7E96421BDB32470CA12=[18211]키트 폭스는 클라우드 코브라가 설계한 메크이며, 스모크 재규어 공장에서는 생산되지 않기 때문에 그들 사이에서는 드문 메크입니다. 이너 스피어의 부대가 처음 대전했을 때, 키트 폭스는 그 유효성에서 북유럽 신화의 궁술의 신의 이름을 따서 '울러'라는 코드네임이 주어졌습니다. 대부분의 경량 메크가 정찰을 위해 속도와 기동성을 우선하는 반면 키트 폭스는 드문 화력 타입입니다. 최대 시속 97.2km로밖에 이동할 수 없는 키트 폭스는, 눈으로 보기도 흐릿할 정도의 장거리 화력으로의 서포트에 특화된 저속의 경량 메크입니다. 키트 폭스의 각 구성은 장거리 사격으로부터 불운하게 접근해 온 타겟에 대한 근접 전투까지 모든 교전 상황에 대응할 수 있는 무장을 갖추고 있습니다.

ED22DAF04CA7CD40B29B4C816256281F=[18221]The Legend-Killer is the near mythical Rifleman of the only seven time Solaris Games Champion, Gray Noton. His dominance over the games for so many years sowed many rumors that Legend-Killer was some lost Star League 'Mech that simply assumed the form of an average Rifleman. After his retirement from the games, Noton became an information broker for the power players on Solaris 7 until his untimely murder. The Legend-Killer would later be piloted by Justin Xiang in the title fight for the 3027 Solaris Championship.
64267BEB4AE2BA5EC7B307922250EFA1=[18222]루시엔 제국 정원은 제국 도시의 도시 정글 속 고요한 오아시스가 되는 것을 의도했습니다. 이 지역의 영감을 준 도쿄의 요요기 공원과 매우 흡사합니다. 주 정원은 거대한 돌 첨탑을 중심으로 하고, 사원으로 꼭대기를 덮고, 티끌과 돌 블록 벽으로 둘러싸여 있습니다.
4D0DD7F140BC1B5D5D8013A3F3BEB74B=[18223]마울러와 바이퍼
20525B51422DF26B482BB5A2EAA962A5=[18224]마울러의 최초 탄생 시의 이름은 다보쿠이다. 원래는 3038년 드라코니스 연맹의 국경을 따라 배치한 기체이다. 연방군에 의해 '마울러'라고 하는 코드네임을 붙인 이 메크는, 쿠리타에게 있어서는 완전한 치욕이며, 운 나쁘게 이 메크에 몸을 실은 멕 워리어에게 있어서는 죽음의 함정 그 자체였다. 3040년대에 섀시가 재 설계되었을 때 다보쿠라는 이름을 버리고 공식적인 애칭으로서 코드네임 마울러가 채용되게 되었지만, 주된 이유는 이전의 실패에 의한 악평을 회피하기 위해서이다. 마울러가 갖춘 초원거리 무기에 의해 대부분의 무기 사정거리 밖에서 적에게 중대한 데미지를 줄 수 있다.

B9A8814F49FEC11DB88B68B80B602CCF=[18228]The McKninnons have been loyal supporters of House Davion since the beginning of what would become the First Succession War, and their family's Black Knight, dubbed Partisan has been there almost every step of the way. Keiran McKinnon's 'Mech quickly became a family heirloom. As parts for the aging Star League era chassis become scarce, Partisan sees less activity and more unconventional repairs. While Ian McKinnon is listed as the current pilot, he's only ever seen piloting the 'Mech at public events and serves in the field piloting a MAD-3R Marauder.

25ABCD414420C7DCD51F08AB7FE0A732=[18231]The Nightstar was born in the early years of the Amaris Civil War when it became clear that battlefield commanders, especially those piloting Marauders, were being specifically targeted by Amaris troops. Eight months after the SLDF commissioned this heavy support and command ’Mech, the first Nightstars were put into production in 2767. Following Kerensky’s Exodus it became an early casualty of the First Succession War, with both of its production facilities being destroyed in 2786. A pair of Gauss Rifles supplemented with an ERPPC give it unprecedented long-range capabilities.

6BAA03DD49E9046CCDF81DB594D12EA3=[18294]성간 연맹 방위군은 정규군 부대의 지휘관을 지원하여 신속한 이동 공세를 수행할 수 있는 공격 플랫폼을 요청했습니다. 엔지니어들은 결국 2710년에 사이클롭스를 선보였으며 이를 지휘 유닛의 일부로 설계했습니다. 불행하게도 사이클롭스는 배틀메크가 처리할 수 있는 충분한 보급품과 지원 유닛을 보유할 것이라는 사고방식으로 인해 어려움을 겪고 있습니다. 계승 전쟁의 대학살과 그것이 배틀메크 연대를 지원하는 군대의 능력을 얼마나 박탈할 것인지는 누구도 예상하지 못했습니다.

338EB0B647AD72E65C1B6AA2AC865C07=[18299]성간 연맹 방위군이 림 월드의 공화국이 점령한 테란 제국에 진출하면서 효과적인 대보병 메크의 필요성이 입증되었습니다. 도시 거리에서의 치열한 근접전은 연맹이 메크를 공화국 보병에게 빼앗기고 있음을 의미했습니다. 성간 연맹 방위군은 문제를 해결하기 위해 새로운 메크에 대한 문의를 제조업체에 신속하게 전달했습니다. 이에 2777년 메이터 테크노는 벌칸으로 화답했습니다. 무장과 장갑은 보병과의 전투를 위해 설계되어 있어 효과적이지만 자체 크기의 메크에 비해 부족하다는 뜻입니다. 벌칸은 최소한 기동성이 뛰어나고 좁은 실루엣을 보여 '허수아비'라는 별명을 얻었습니다.

2BC281AE488E66F6096B82B2D0034E7E=[18313]2945년 클랜 울프에 의해 세상에 탄생한 팀버 울프는 그 제조의 비밀이 지금도 엄중하게 지켜지고 있습니다. 자신의 고향 클랜 외부에서 볼 수 있는 모든 팀버 울프는 노획, 선물 또는 거래의 일부로 획득한 것입니다. 부품이 수작업으로 만들어져 있다는 소문도 있어, 그 품질과 장인 기술의 산 증거가 되고 있습니다. 팀버 울프는 처음으로 마주한 이너 스피어 방어팀의 눈에는 불가능한 위업에 불과했으며, 이는 디자인의 품질을 더욱 입증했습니다. 머로더와 캐터펄트를 섞어 놓은 듯한 메크의 등장으로 인해 컴스타는 팀버울프에게 코드명 '매드 캣'을 부여했습니다. 가장 잘 알려진 클랜 메크 중 하나인 팀버 울프는 침입한 클랜이 전장에서 달성하고자 하는 모든 것을 상징합니다. 빠르고 압도적이며 뚫을 수 없습니다.

EE73D01E404B21B8220430AB136F098A=[18408]메크의 몸통이 회전할 수 있는 최대각도는 얼마나 되는가
177415D34250628DE8F95B85A94A30AB=[18409]The maximum brightness for auto exposure that limits the upper brightness the eye can adapt within. Values must be greater than 0 and should be greater than or equal to Min Brightness. A good value should be positive (2 is a good starting point), and should be adjusted in a bright lighting situation. For instance, if the value is too small, the image appears too bright. If too large, the images appears too dark. Actual values depend on the HDR range of the content being used. If Max Brightness is equal to Min Brightness, auto exposure is disabled.
757C65C1424C35692473D7A8E3E1ECA8=[18410]메크의 최대 속도를 어디까지 늘릴 수 있는가

F82A446D4DA071BCDB635AB67F664242=[18416]The minimum brightness for auto exposure that limits the lower brightness the eye can adapt within. Values must be lower than 0 and should be greater than or equal to Max Brightness. A good value should be a positive near 0 and should be adjusted in a dark lighting situation. For instance, if the value is too small, the image appears too bright. If too large, the image appears too dark. Actual values depend on the HDR range of the content being used. If Min Brightness is equal to Max Brightness, auto exposure is disabled.

C2C5B4AA4A5926D23BC8C9BE76693B3E=[18435]The personal Battlemech of Jenny Templeton of the Chesterton Reserves, 'Butterbee' mounted quad SRM 6 packs instead of the pair of LRM launchers. During intense urban combat the catapult would be regarded as a primarily long ranged 'Mech, effectively armed only with medium lasers. After a few hit-and-jump attacks with the lasers, Templeton would unleash the missiles. Catching the invaders off guard, the missiles spread out and often hit the holes that her lasers left. If they survived the missile blasts, enemies were usually killed off while still in shock.

CDD7471F4E61B99367C8D0B3F5A491E8=[19083]This is the marketplace where you can requisition 'Mechs, weapons, and equipment from the merchant caste to use in your Star. Your merchant requisition budget is tracked using Kerenskies. Credit is gained by successfully completing missions and secondary objectives. You can also sell back any materiel you no longer need for credit.<cf><cf>When you reach sufficient Honor Levels, you will be able spend your earned Merits to unlock access to new 'Mech chassis.
5309C87A48B0E54330E3AD9AC54456C2=[19084]이 곳은 과학 실험실입니다. 과학자 카스트에게 메크의 장갑, 구조, 무기, 장비 업그레이드 연구를 명령할 수 있습니다. <cf><cf> 각 임무가 끝나면 전쟁에서 다양한 구성 요소를 회수하도록 설비 승무원에게 지시 할 수 있습니다. 이러한 부품들은 과학자가 각 연구 프로젝트를 시작하는 데 필요한 원재료입니다. <cf><cf> 연구 프로젝트가 시작되면 플레이어가 임무에 파견되는 동안에도 과학자가 자동으로 작업을 수행하고 각 사이클마다 연구 결과를 얻을 수 있습니다. <cf><cf> 과학자를 징용하거나 과학실의 설비를 업그레이드함으로써 얻어지는 연구 결과의 양은 늘어납니다. 또한, 인양 작업을 업그레이드하면, 전장으로부터 보다 많은 구성품을 회수할 수 있게 됩니다.

241CAB2A4495D79E2EC8599C75F1EA84=[19144]This will adjust the bright color in the tonemapper. Value is in the range of [0.0, 1.0]
FE97E2F0490DC192D887BB9D99D06D1B=[19145]This will adjust the dark color in the tonemapper. Value is in the range of [0.0, 1.0]. [0.0, 1.0].
B67A98CD4A861DE6485734BB43A50D24=[19146]This will adjust the intensity (purity) of the colors (hue) that are being represented. A higher saturation intensity will result in colors appearing more like their purest forms (red, green, blue) and when saturation is lowered colors will appear more gray or washed-out.
A9A826034F3AB1317F33959C405A1AE8=[19147]This will adjust the luminance intensity of the image's blacks (shadows) to accurately reproduce colors. Raising or lowering this value will result in the image shadows being washed-out or too dark.
9776BC0C4727C23CED6434B9468428E5=[19148]This will adjust the luminance intensity of the image's mid-tones to accurately reproduce colors. Lowering or raising this value will result in the image being washed-out or too dark.
A03F9D9C4076F8372B300E82B711D5C4=[19149]This will adjust the luminance intensity of the image's whites (highlights) to accurately reproduce colors. Raising or lowering this value will result in the image highlights being washed-out or too dark.
7FAFE26B4E3AAFF0710AA58469B36551=[19150]This will adjust the steepness of the S-curve used for the tonemapper, where larger values will make the slope steeper (darker) and lower values will make the slope less steep (lighter). Value is in the range of [0.0, 1.0]. [0.0, 1.0].
9907A38B452ABB7A602A3A8DA81626E5=[19151]This will adjust the tonal range of light and dark color values in your scene. Lowering the intensity will remove highlights and lighten the image resulting in a washed-out appearance, whereas a higher intensity will tighten the highlights and darken the overall image.

0CDA8D2349BD307C4230F3B706370495=[19190]Though initially carrying a blistering array of advanced technology due to its last-minute entry into the Star League Defense Force ranks in 2780, the Trebuchet was also one of the first BattleMechs that went back to the drawing board as a result of the Succession Wars. Redesigned using older technology so Corean Enterprises could continue to manufacture the chassis in an era defined by scarcity, the Trebuchet is a solid support 'Mech ideal meant for long-range bombardment.

2FC5B0504DFBD0BD2A1ECC8E1E42DCFD=[19192]Though initially carrying a blistering array of advanced technology due to its last-minute entry into the Star League Defense Force ranks in 2780, the Trebuchet was also one of the first BattleMechs that went back to the drawing board as a result of the Succession Wars. Redesigned using older technology so Corean Enterprises could continue to manufacture the chassis in an era defined by scarcity, the Trebuchet is a solid support 'Mech ideal meant for long-range bombardment.

33A653C24D592FD8EF34189F9B424007=[20330]경고: 이것은 어려운 임무이며, 높은 톤수가 권장됩니다. 시간은 끝없이 뻗어나가는 강입니다. 클랜 제이드 팰컨의 칸 엘리아스 크리첼은 그러한 지점 중 하나에서 클랜 스모크 재규어와 일칸 레오 샤워스를 동맹이 아닌 적으로 여겼습니다. 제안된 침략 계획 사이에 근본적으로 분열된 두 클랜은 정면으로 대립했습니다. 무언가를 주어야 했고, 이 모든 것이 피로 해결될 것이라는 것을 이해했습니다. 제이드 팰컨은 헌트리스에 대한 공격적인 전면 공격으로 먼저 공격했습니다. 이번 침공이 헌트리스 시험장에서 킷 제이든의 시련과 겹친 것은, 단순한 행운인가 운명인가.

D2824DF445162B9E9154D6B14207D8E7=[21415]When 'Goblin' left Nik's Cavaliers he was piloting a standard PXH-1K Phoenix Hawk. At some point after his departure he stumbled upon and salvaged a rare PXH-1B which he fondly calls 'Kobold'. With most of the 'Mech's advanced technology destroyed beyond repair, Goblin began a major overhaul to replace the lostech and adjust the loadout to something he was more familiar with. He also bolted on a pair of SRM launchers that he managed to get hold of. When asked about the missiles, Goblin explained that "sometimes y'gotta blow something up real good, and lasers just don't have enough boom!"
3BBBD0CC4101ADFCCDD077A65BDF845B=[21416]알렉산드르 케렌스키 장군이 2755년에 아틀라스의 설계 사양을 정했을 때, 그는 그것이 "가능한 한 강력하고, 가능한 한 뚫을 수 없으며, 상상할 수 있는 한 추하고 불길한 '메크여야 합니다. 그래야 두려움 자체가 우리의 동맹이 될 것입니다."라고 선언했습니다. 아틀라스는 그러한 야망을 충족시켰고, 첫 배치부터 무서운 평판을 얻었습니다. 중장갑, 중무장, 그리고 엄청난 두려움을 안겨주는 아틀라스는 화력의 둔중한 괴물입니다.

0ECA2DF9419EB2AD17E69DAE41D6B735=[21420]홀리스 주식회사가 배틀메크 산업의 진가를 시험하고 싶었을 때, 그들은 완전히 새로운 디자인과 최첨단 공장으로 이를 실현했습니다. 그들은 지구 제국과 맺은 3년 계약에 따라 기록적인 수의 캐터펄트를 출하했지만, 계약이 갱신되지 않자 2563년에 생산을 중단했습니다. 주로 화력 지원 플랫폼인 캐터펄트는 종종 2선 및 전문 산악 등반 연대에서 사용됩니다.

DD7C5B324F74FBA4A81BF991A2BB3986=[21429]우리는 언제쯤 다시 튼튼한 대지를 밟게 될까요?
35AC559544C0B9B9E9F2D3851CCC00FB=[21430]그가 울프 용기병대와 처음 접촉한 것은 언제부터였나?
83E99CD64C4BA16D4B9DADB34F093A2A=[21431]네 부대는 언제부터 네가 클랜에 대한 반역자를 숨겨주고 있다는 사실을 알게 되었나?
EB612295421390D4189973B938D093C4=[21432]이너 스피어 부대가 처음 목격했을 때 매드 독은 '벌쳐'라는 코드네임으로 불렸다. 이 메크는 장거리 무장으로 전장을 돌고 공격의 기회를 기다리도록 설계되어 있다고 생각되었다. 하지만 실제로 매드 독의 운용 사례는 훨씬 더 공격적이었다. 매드 독의 목적은 최후의 일격을 가하기 위해 적에게 접근하면서 장거리 포화를 끊임없이 퍼붓는 것이었다. 서모너나 팀버 울프에서 볼 수 있는 생존성은 결여되지만, 매드 독의 화력은 만만치 않다.
E95834884AB4CF3622D42CAD2799452A=[21433]이너 스피어의 메크 파일럿에 의해 최초로 목격되었을 때, PPC와 LB 10-X AC를 주요 무장으로 갖춘 서모너는, 그 화력을 천둥과 번개의 이미지와 겹쳐 보아 '토르'라는 코드네임을 부여 받았다. 가장 오래된 2세대 옴니메크 중에서, 서모너는 다른 중량 옴니메크에 비해 더 민첩한 기동성으로 화력 지원 역할을 한다. 나름의 화력과 장갑을 갖추고 대량의 점프젯까지 장비한 서모너는 이상적인 다목적 메크이다.

106F34B74371330D118DB48D62BA8847=[21437]When it was first seen during the invasion, the Hellbringer was dubbed Loki due to every version seen having a configuration that defied all intelligent design in the eyes of the Inner Sphere. The Hellbringer is the frailest of the invasion heavy 'Mechs, sharing many parts with the Summoner to cut back production time and costs. However, unlike the Summoner, the Hellbringer lacks jump jets and does not carry as much armor. What it does bring to the table is an immensely powerful, very versatile arsenal that ensures it is prepared for every possible encounter.
5D0B91F34F29836B29A61B975426FF14=[21438]원래 2719년 성간 연맹를 위해 제작되었을 때, 코사라 무기 제조소가 취한 접근 방식은 쉽게 유지 관리가 가능하고 공급선에서 멀리 떨어진 곳에서의 내구성 있는 공격에 적합한 배틀메크를 만드는 것이었습니다. 많은 사람들이 크랩을 신뢰할 수 있는 대기형으로 보고 결국 성간 연대 중형 메크의 표준으로 삼았습니다. 그러나 리그의 붕괴로 인해 설계가 고아가 되었고, 철섬유 장갑 생산의 손실로 인해 결국 수세기 동안 살아남은 유닛은 표준 장갑을 착용하도록 다운그레이드되었습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 크랩의 우아한 단순함은 여전히 현대에서도 충분히 통용된다는 것을 실증하고 있습니다.
949CA24848CFB5C387D180AE63EF73B5=[21439]원래 2719년 성간 연맹를 위해 제작되었을 때, 코사라 무기 제조소가 취한 접근 방식은 쉽게 유지 관리가 가능하고 공급선에서 멀리 떨어진 곳에서의 내구성 있는 공격에 적합한 배틀메크를 만드는 것이었습니다. 많은 사람들이 크랩을 신뢰할 수 있는 대기형으로 보고 결국 성간 연대 중형 메크의 표준으로 삼았습니다. 그러나 리그의 붕괴로 인해 설계가 고아가 되었고, 철섬유 장갑 생산의 손실로 인해 결국 수세기 동안 살아남은 유닛은 표준 장갑을 착용하도록 다운그레이드되었습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 크랩의 우아한 단순함은 여전히 현대에서도 충분히 통용된다는 것을 실증하고 있습니다.

9469BC864435501C2BFCFC97968C3DC3=[21442]그 날이 온다면, 함께 싸워 줄래?
7DB16A3843A53F1B9F09FBAAAB0FC1DF=[21443]함대가 복귀하고 침공이 재개되면, 이것이 내가 내 미래를 내 손으로 움켜쥐는 데 필요한 강점이 될 거야.
1C213FC748DD915BAAB2F7BBD6D3C204=[21444]When the original Star League Defense Force left the Inner Sphere, many staple Inner Sphere ‘Mech designs at the time came with them. Later, as their descendant Clans steadily improved their technology over the centuries and began creating their powerful and coveted OmniMechs, many old Inner Sphere designs became obsolete. Some, however, were reborn with new designs utilizing upgraded Clan technology. These ‘Mechs were known as Mark Two Clan 'Mechs. (Universally abbreviated as IIC.) Though they never gained the same popularity among the Clans due to their lack of OmniMech technology.The Jenner IIC is a much later design, created a decade before the invasion. A fast and mobile scout designed to clear out early opponents with a hail of missiles, the Jenner IIC levies an unrelenting barrage wherever it travels.
A826AB1B4B96070AE6582C8C6373EED2=[21445]조종사 복장이 완성에 가까워졌을 때, 더욱 생생한 세부 사항을 구체화하기 위해 최종 피드백을 실시했습니다.

5F0493AE41A09AB43FD99AA6F34DC756=[21490]고대 성간 연맹 기록에 따르면 원래의 어나힐레이터 설계도는 아마리스 내전의 마지막 해인 2780년으로 거슬러 올라가지만, 이 기체는 3009년 신비한 울프 드라군 용병단에서 발견되기 전까지는 실제로 생산에 들어간 적이 없었습니다. 최고 속도가 시속 32.4km로 지금까지 설계된 메크 중 '가장 느린' 메크 중 하나이며, 어나힐레이터는 엄청난 양의 장갑을 사용하여 자신에게 향하는 모든 공격을 무시합니다. 엄청난 화력과 함께 어나힐레이터는 '섬멸자'라는 이름에 부응합니다.

7EDC7E304DB5F2726EB29E80DAF04341=[21497]해칫맨의 디자인은 3023년부터 라이란 연방에서 의뢰하여 제작되었지만, 항성 합중국의 NAIS에서 일하는 팀 '반자이'에서 나왔다는 소문이 있습니다. 1세기 만에 처음으로 보이는 새로운 메크 섀시이며 근접 무기인 이름을 딴 도끼를 사용한 최초의 모델입니다. 해칫맨의 현재 도시 수비대 배치는 성공적이었으며, 많은 적들이 AC/10 사격과 도끼 휘두르기의 근접 매복에 굴복했습니다. 이로 인해 이 디자인을 더 많이 배치할 계획이 생겼고, 항성 합중국이 앞으로 메크를 선적받을 것이라는 소문도 있습니다.

0FA3940B4167017D5E8F84B6BE4C65B2=[21507]While the original Rifleman existed as a poorly armored fire support ‘Mech, the Rifleman IIC can take fire as hard as it dishes it out. Five tons heavier than its original counterpart, the Rifleman IIC carries almost double the armor of its predecessor and sports a blistering array of weapons in all configurations. The only downgrade this ‘Mech has from its original is the loss of speed.

33FDE2FC45EB28EA071387BBC22AB4D2=[21548]루시엔 공업사의 가장 큰 실패작으로 널리 알려진 CGR-1A1 차저는 초중형 정찰 유닛으로 구상되었습니다. 2665년에 출시된 이 차저의 무장은 우스꽝스럽고 장갑은 정찰 임무에는 충분하지만 비슷한 크기의 적에게는 부족합니다. 거대한 프레임에 비해 놀라운 속도를 낼 수 있다는 점은 주목할 만하지만, 단점을 상쇄하기에 충분하지 않으며, 이 차저에 배치하는 것 자체가 처벌이라고 널리 여겨집니다. 차저의 다른 변형은 단점을 없앨 수 있지만, 메크의 최고 속도를 낮춤으로써만 가능합니다.

DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Warships_Textfield=[22512]"I never thought I would ever see one of the ancient WarShips. These things used to be at the top of the food chain when it came to the supreme military power of the Star League. Massive spacecraft that acted as JumpShips, armed to the teeth with naval weapons and assault DropShips.”<cf><cf>"And were often used to rain death across entire systems with nuclear fire and chemical strikes. Untold billions died at the hands of these monsters. It's not surprising that they were the first things to be targeted and destroyed in the early Succession Wars.”<cf><cf>Fahad Arazad & Ryana Campbell, Nik's Cavaliers<cf><cf>WarShips, the heavily armored combat JumpShips, are regarded as one of the shining examples of man's creation, with unparalleled scope and sophistication. These technological behemoths can rip through the stars in the blink of an eye and maneuver through a system at alarming speeds. The remaining WarShips of the Inner Sphere, the last remnants of the Star League fleet, were eradicated during the Second Succession War. Then, a period of technological decline occurred. No new WarShips were produced for the next century. Although the recovery of lost technologies following the Fourth Succession War made WarShip construction possible in theory, the scars of the past prompted the leaders of the Inner Sphere to reach an unspoken agreement to limit JumpShip research to transport vessels. But unknown to the Inner Sphere, the Children of Kerensky had no such agreements. They spent centuries refitting many of their ships, often the same craft that took Kerensky into exodus, with more modern Clan technologies. Making what was already terrifyingly deadly craft all the more lethal.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_14thLegionOfVega_Header=[22513]14TH LEGION OF VEGA
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_362ndAssaultCluster_Header=[22514]362ND ASSAULT CLUSTER
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Crusader_Textfield=[22515]A 'Mech originally intended for close combat by the Star League Defense Force, the Crusader is a venerable workhorse that can easily fit into any desired role. With variant options that allow it to focus on a wide variety of engagements, this well-armored heavy 'Mech was one of the later designs before the exodus of the Star League. It remains one of the most reliable 'Mechs in the Inner Sphere and is highly desired by all houses.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mechs_Textfield=[22516]A BattleMech, or 'Mech for short, is often considered the pinnacle of armored warfare. Piloted by highly trained MechWarriors, 'Mechs are suited for almost all forms of terrain and are much more versatile than their more common vehicle counterparts. A 'Mech can range from 20 to 100 tons and 8 meters to 25 meters tall and, even at their lightest configurations, carry a staggering amount of firepower compared to conventional combat vehicles. It is said that once a 'Mech is deployed, its only viable challenge is another 'Mech. Their only downside is the tremendous cost and upkeep required.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_JS_StarLord_Textfield=[22517]A Star Lord may be the pinnacle of size and luxury, but the astronomical cost of purchasing and maintaining this goliath has kept all but a handful of these craft in rotation of the Successor States or the Clans. Although it the cost of putting it into service is high, the Star Lord is utilized by most Clans. The elevated technology levels maintained by Kerensky's descendants have enabled many vessels to be operational, making Star Lords more common in the Clan occupation zone than the rest of the Inner Sphere.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Aero_Corsair_Textfield=[22518]A design formed in the twilight of the Star League, the Corsair brands itself as a sleek medium attack craft with a unique affinity for in-atmosphere operations. The Corsair is a shorter-range fighter with decent armor and can fit in various unit compositions. Like the Sparrowhawk, almost all production facilities for the Corsair were destroyed during the Succession Wars. The Federated Suns worked tirelessly to defend their remaining lines, though eventually, the last Corsair plant was destroyed, and the secrets of its creation were lost to time.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_ClanWolf_Textfield=[22519]A dominant force both on the battlefield and in the political halls of Strana Mechty, Clan Wolf has reveled in their ability to adapt to any situation presented to them. Although other clans can boast about having the stronger touman, or the better warriors, no Clan holds the same amount of respect among their peers as Clan Wolf. Much of this is due to Clan Wolf's venerated position as the caretakers of the Kerensky genetic legacy. A position the Wolves fiercely guard since ilKhan Nicholas Kerensky personally chose their Clan to carry on his genetic heritage.<cf><cf>This honored position often makes Clan Wolf the fulcrum on which Clan politics revolves. A single well-placed word from a Wolf Khan can often turn the tide of any debate. As was the case when the Dragoon Compromise was ratified. But this has also resulted in Clan Wolf being a constant target for upstart Clans looking to win points and chip away any political or military advantage the Wolves might have. With a recent example being Clan Smoke Jaguar's constant prodding to further elevate the standing of their own Clan.<cf><cf>Because of this elevated position within Clan society, Clan Wolf is composed of the most politically diverse touman. With a near-perfectly divide of Wardens and Crusaders within their roster. This position often sees the tactics and attitudes of Clan Wolf as a whole, ebb and flow based on the individuals that find themselves in leadership positions within the Clan.<cf><cf>In battle, this has often made Clan Wolf highly adaptable and malleable, often adopting unconventional tactics that can leave opponents blindsided. Their diverse leadership roster also results in various tactics deployed depending on the cluster. Making them one of the least predictable of Clans. Both on and off the battlefield.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Firestarter_Textfield=[22520]A specialty BattleMech originally designed in 2550, the Firestarter became the de facto standard for incendiary platforms. With production numbering well into the thousands, Firestarters were a common sight among House and mercenary troops throughout the Succession Wars. Still common today, Firestarters are often seen as replacements in recon lances instead of their intended specialized role.

DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_AerospaceFighters_Textfield=[22531]Aerospace fighters are a complete replacement for conventional combat aircraft for the factions that can afford them. Utilizing much of the same technology as BattleMechs, aerospace fighters can function effectively in almost any atmosphere and deep space operations. Aerospace fighters operate in the same weight ranges as BattleMechs, ranging from 20 to 100 tons, and carry very similar weapon types. Similar to BattleMechs, aerospace fighters are costly to produce and maintain, which walled them off from all but the largest organizations.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Aero_Jagatai_Textfield=[22532]After Clan Wolf first fielded the Jagatai in 3016, it quickly spread across the Clans as a premier medium OmniFighter. At 70 tons, the Jagatai had the level of maneuverability that one could reasonably expect for a vehicle of its size. Where the Jagatai truly excelled was its armor, weaponry, and a larger fuel tank that allowed it to remain in deployment for extended durations. For the forces of the Inner Sphere, engaging a Jagatai in a fair fight was considered suicide.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_ShadowHawk_Textfield=[22533]After an unfortunate (and costly) false start caused by quality and safety issues, the Shadow Hawk now seen throughout the Inner Sphere began production in 2550. With a diverse array of armaments the Shadow Hawk is a highly adaptable chassis, able to fit into almost any situation where a 'Mech might be needed.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Hellbringer_Textfield=[22534]After it was first sighted during the invasion, the Hellbringer was dubbed Loki due to every version seen having a configuration that defied all intelligent design in the eyes of the Inner Sphere. The Hellbringer is the frailest of the invasion heavy 'Mechs, sharing many parts with the Summoner to cut back production time and costs. However, unlike the Summoner, the Hellbringer lacks jump jets and does not carry as much armor. What it does bring to the table is a powerful, versatile arsenal that ensures it is prepared for every possible encounter.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_ComStar_Textfield=[22535]After the Amaris Civil War, Jerome Blake was appointed head of the Star League's Minister of Communications. Charged with maintaining the Hyper Pulse Generator (HPG) network that allowed for long-range communications throughout the stars. After learning of Kerensky's intention to leave the Inner Sphere, Blake leveraged his power to do what he could to aid his friend's escape from known human space. With the SLDF gone, Blake foresaw the same collapse of the League that Kerensky believed was imminent and set about a plan to save the Star League's HPG communications network to ensure that the ensuing conflict would not leave all of humanity in darkness.<cf><cf>He reforged the League's Department of Communications into a private international corporation, ComStar. Using SLDF troops that did not join Kerensky in exile, ComStar seized control of the Terran system and broadcasted his demands to each of the Great House Lords. Terra and the HPG communication network would become ComStar's sole domain. If every Great House respected that sovereignty, ComStar would act as a neutral party providing HPG communications services to all mankind as a universal good. Those who did not respect their status as a neutral entity would be cut off from the HPG Network. Essentially cutting off offending parties from the rest of humanity.<cf><cf>Centuries after Blake's passing, ComStar's reach has only grown. Although the order remains the sole steward of Terra and the HPG communications network throughout the Inner Sphere, their position of neutrality was leveraged to become the unquestioned leaders of Interstellar finance and mercenary relationships. The ComStar Bill, or C-bill, became the de-facto international currency Sphere-wide. At the same time, the Mercenary Review Board (MRB) administers Interstellar rules between the various Mercenaries of the Inner Sphere and the prospective employers that wish to enlist their services.<cf><cf>Although there have been times that ComStar's neutrality has been called into question, to the average citizen of the Inner Sphere, they are seen as a universal force of good. The caretakers of Terra and the last true torchbearers of the long-lost Star League holding back the darkness. Because of this, the ComStar order and their Acolytes have taken on an almost religious adherence to their organization. An organization that is, on paper, nothing more than an interstellar communications corporation.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Vindicator_Textfield=[22536]After the devastation of the First Succession War, the Capellan Confederation was in dire need of BattleMechs. Ceres Metals took up the challenge and in 2826 provided a cheap but tough 'Mech that could be mass produced. Like the proverbial camel, the Vindicator is a committee-designed beast that fills many roles adequately but none of them well. With good jump capabilities, decent armor, and respectable heat efficiency, the Vindicator is a capable platform for sustained long-range engagements.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Enforcer_Textfield=[22537]Already in the midst of a veritable love affair with autocannon platforms, the Federated Suns stumbled upon forgotten blueprints for an unbuilt autocannon-armed BattleMech and used it as the basis for a new design. The Enforcer was rushed through development and commissioned in 2777, and over the course of the Succession Wars became a workhorse of House Davion.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_14thLegionOfVega_Textfield=[22538]Also known as the "Path of Redemption," the Legion of Vega was formed as a company of misfits, malcontents, and anyone the Combine deemed unfit to serve in general units. After Theodore Kurita was assigned to the Legion as another outcast, he quickly gained their trust and loyalty as their commander. Due to the Legion already having the reputation of an honorless unit, Theodore could test many of his reforms and new tactics, which were much to the benefit of the Legion. They demonstrated their new prowess by winning a tremendous victory against Fredrick Steiner and the Tenth Lyran Guard during the Fourth Succession War. The Legion quickly followed it up with a defiant defense of the Vega system during the War of 3039. The stellar performance of the Legion during these conflicts propelled them up to the same status as other premier Draconis regiments, such as the Sword of Light and Genyosha. Craftiness and wit made up what they lacked in decorum and official standing.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_DS_Gazelle_Textfield=[22539]Although smaller in scale compared to the other armor transport DropShips in use, the Gazelle is capable of carrying a complete 15-vehicle company of armored combat vehicles. At its inception, the Gazelle was intended to operate with the smaller, lighter combat vehicles designed before the Succession Wars. Later, it was modified, increasing the hold in the craft's nose to compensate. These modifications came at the cost of the crew quarters and cargo capacity, significantly reducing comfort and inhibiting the design's endurance on more extended missions.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_ClanJadeFalcon_Textfield=[22540]Ardent Crusaders and fierce traditionalists to Nicholas Kerensky's teachings, the Jade Falcons are among the most prideful of the Clans. Believing themselves to be the rightful torchbearers of Nicholas Kerensky's legacy. While this attitude may make them appear overtly aloof and condescending to those outside their Clan, the Jade Falcons have time and again proven themselves worthy of such boasts, as there are few Clans that can challenge the Jade Falcon's prowess on the battlefield.<cf><cf>In battle, the Falcons pride themselves on their tactical acumen. Where most Clan warriors master the art of honor duels or small-scale engagements, the Falcons have become masters at large-scale operations. Seeing each asset on the battlefield as a chess piece to leverage in a larger strategy. To the Falcons, there is an art in knowing when to observe the battlefield for advantage and when to swiftly swoop down and strike.<cf><cf>During Operation KLONDIKE, ilKhan Nicholas Kerensky led the Falcons and Wolves in the final assault on Eden, ending the Pentagon Civil War. When Kerensky formed the various Bloodhouses that the Clans based their eugenics programs on, the Falcons were devastated to learn that the ilKhan had chosen Clan Wolf as the Clan to steward his genetic legacy. The dissatisfaction with ilKhan Kerensky's decision has locked Clan Jade Falcon and Clan Wolf in a centuries-long rivalry over which Clan deserves the Founder's legacy.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_TheStarLeague_Textfield=[22541]As each newly colonized world developed, conflicts arose as each system began to assert its independence or allegiance to Terra and its newly formed Hegemony. After a long period of conquest and consolidation, most of the more well-developed central systems formed six major powers. The Terran Hegemony who held stewardship over Terra, the Free Worlds League, the Federated Suns, the Draconis Combine, the Lyran Commonwealth, and the Capellan Confederation. The nation’s ruling families became what would be known as the Great Houses of the Inner Sphere.  The remote systems outside the Great House’s area of influence would become what is known today as the Periphery.<cf><cf>Eventually, every system within the Inner Sphere owed allegiance to at least one of the Great Houses. With no independent system left to conquer, the Great Houses would turn on each other. Erupting into 150 years of conflict that would become known as the Age of War.<cf><cf>After developing BattleMech technology and becoming the largest power block to survive the Age of War, House Cameron sought to end the perpetual conflicts and chartered an alliance between all six Great Houses. This united the majority of colonized space under the banner of the Star League.<cf><cf>For over 200 years, the Star League was the apex of human civilization. Eventually unifying all human colonized space under its banner. The Star League oversaw unparalleled advancements in technology, centuries of peace, and economic prosperity under the protection of mankind's greatest peacekeepers, the Star League Defense Force. An army formed from every corner of the League seeking to deter conflict and curb the scope of pocket wars that erupted between the League’s member states. Under the unified banner of the Star League, humanity had entered a true golden age of civilization.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Archer_Textfield=[22542]As its name suggests, the Archer was designed in 2458 to fulfill the Terran Hegemony's need for a long-range support 'Mech. With production of the ARC-2R beginning a mere 30 years after BattleMechs first took to the field, the Archer quickly became one of the most prolific chassis in the Inner Sphere. Well-armored and with a decent top speed the Archer excels in keeping enemies at long range, but pilots run the risk of overheating during high-intensity, close-quarter encounters.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Griffin_Textfield=[22543]As one of the first designs to fill the void between the massive Mackie and the smaller recon 'Mechs subsequently produced, the Griffin was considered a highly advanced design when it rolled off the line in 2492. With the mobility of a recon unit and the firepower and armor of a heavy 'Mech, Earthwerks' creation reigned supreme on the battlefield for a brief period. As time passed and newer, more advanced chassis started rolling off the production lines, the Griffin found a more specific niche as a mobile fire-support unit.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Aero_Sparrowhawk_Textfield=[22544]At 30 tons, the Sparrowhawk is one of the lightest aerospace fighters deployed by the Inner Sphere. With an almost unmatched speed and maneuverability, the Sparrowhawk most commonly was an escort to larger aerospace fighters and dropships and a rapid response unit. With incredible fuel efficiency and laser weapons that require no ammunition, the Sparrowhawk can find itself on much longer operations with little need to refuel or rearm. This fighter was unveiled in 2520, though with the destruction of almost all plants producing it during the Succession Wars, it has become a rarer sight in the Inner Sphere.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Banshee_Header=[22545]BANSHEE
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_BattleMaster_Header=[22546]BATTLEMASTER
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mechs_Header=[22547]BATTLEMECH

DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Champion_Textfield=[22552]Bergman Industries introduced the Champion in 2602 intending to to be a heavy recon or light strike platform. Popular during the the Star League era, and often found serving in brush wars. The design wasn't without critics, who were quick to poke holes in its light armor, figuratively and sometimes literally. Now a rare sight on the battlefield, the Champion is still a formidable tactical fighter, able to move fast and strike hard.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_Genyosha_Textfield=[22553]Built to carry on its founder, Yorinaga Kurita's legacy, no unit is as devoted to the Dragon and passionate as the Genyosha. Answering only to the Coordinator and whoever he deems worthy, the Genyosha is a smaller unit that makes up for its size in raw power. Despite their near-religious adherence to the orders and whims of their House, the Genyosha places heavy emphasis on their MechWarriors being able to think freely and operate independently without a clear command structure. Despite the youth of their regiment in the Combine, the Genyosha boasts a list of victories and achievements that most organizations can only dream of. Wherever they are, House Kurita expects victory to follow soon.<cf><cf>The Genyosha will get the first selection of all supplies. 'Mechs, weapons, equipment, even people. The Genyosha can handpick any MechWarrior from any other unit they deem fit to join their illustrious ranks. Even the flagship Sword of Light regiment must wait their turn when the Genyosha is present.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_AmarisCivilWar_Textfield=[22554]But it was not to last. In the dark corners of the Periphery, Stefan Amaris of the Rim Worlds Republic, the Usurper, was preparing a coup. Envious of House Cameron’s riches and lusting for power of his own, Stefan weaseled his way into the good graces of Richard Cameron. Becoming the young First Lord’s confidant and most trusted advisor. When the New Vanderburg Uprisings pulled the SLDF and its commander, General Aleksandr Kerensky, away to the Taurian Concordat, the Usurper struck. Shooting First Lord Cameron in the head and declaring himself ruler of the new Amaris Empire.<cf><cf>Furious at his betrayal, General Kerensky and the rest of the Star League Defense Force fought their way back from New Vanderburg into the Hegemony now under siege from the Rim Worlds Army. Over the next ten years, the Amaris Civil War raged across the Terran Hegemony. The SLDF valiantly fought to liberate the League from the Usurper's loyalist forces. Eventually, General Kerensky would knock down the palace doors in Unity City, bringing the war to an end.<cf><cf>But it was a Pyrrhic victory.  Despite defeating the Usurper and the Rim World Army, Kerensky had learned that not only had Amaris murdered Richard Cameron but the entirety of the Cameron family. With the Hegemony’s ruling family wiped out and the once-great Hegemony reeling from a decade of total war, Kerensky foresaw the Hegemony’s inevitable collapse. And the vultures already circling, intending to pick the Hegemony’s corpse clean.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_InnerSphereBattlemechs_Textfield=[22555]By the time of the invasion, BattleMech creation and innovation had almost completely stagnated in the Inner Sphere. Only the most prominent and wealthiest factions could attempt designing a new chassis. At the same time, less fortunate groups struggled to maintain their current inventory. After countless wars and conflicts, almost all the secrets of BattleMech production had been lost to time, and those who had managed to hold on to BattleMech production facilities carefully guarded their remaining treasures. More minor factions and organizations who could not build BattleMechs or maintain their current stock were forced to resort to cannibalism. 'Mechs would have their parts stripped in the hopes of repairing or building other 'Mechs.<cf><cf>That all changed with the rediscovery of the Helm Memory Core. However, even over thirty years after the core was distributed to each of the Successor States, only now are the various militaries of the Inner Sphere regaining the capability to understand once again and develop new BattleMechs.  But even with new chassis' like the Hatchetman, Raven, and Hatamoto-chi becoming more common sights in the armies of the Inner Sphere, they still barely maintain a level of what is essentially three-hundred-year-old technology. Paling in comparison to the modern machines of our Clan toumen.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_ClanBanners_Textfield=[22556]By the turn of the 31st century, only seventeen of Kerensky's original twenty clans remained. With Clan Mongoose and Windowmaker each absorbed into Clans Smoke Jaguar and Wolf, respectively. One Clan, only referred to now as the "Not-Named-Clan," was annihilated at the hands of the collective Clan body for daring to stand against the Grand Council's will.<cf><cf>The remaining seventeen Clans proudly fly their banners above the hallowed grounds of the Hall of Khans. The venue of choice for forums held by the Clan Grand Council to be heard.

DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Urbanmech_Textfield=[22579]Called upon to produce an effective light 'Mech for city fighting, Orgus Industries replied with the UrbanMech in 2675. Cheap to produce and potent in its assigned duties, the 'Mech was manufactured in large numbers until the destruction of the Orgus Industries production lines, though many survived the Succession Wars. While extremely slow - not just for a light 'Mech but for any 'Mech - the UrbanMech is notable for its unique 360-degree torso turn ability, giving it a decisive edge in urban combat.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_ArcticCheetah_Textfield=[22580]Clan Ice Hellion embarked on a tall order, building a light 'Mech for the invasion that would be able to replace the venerable Mist Lynx. Completed in 3037, the Clan Ice Hellion factory used to create the Arctic Cheetah was conquered by Clan Smoke Jaguar and folded into the Jaguars' primary invasion force. When House Kurita defenses first encountered it, the Arctic Cheetah was given the code name Hankyu, or "Short Bow." Five tons heavier than its predecessor, the Arctic Cheetah is faster, has more armor, better scouting equipment, and boasts more firepower than the Mist Lynx.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Nova_Textfield=[22581]Codenamed Blackhawk by Inner Sphere Forces, the Nova was an earlier design among the invasion rosters. Debuting in 2870, the 'Mech set many trends in OmniMech production down the road. Despite the age of the 'Mech, it was still a common sight in the invasion. Boasting 12 ER Medium Lasers to light up the sky, it is no wonder how the Nova got its name. The extreme levels of firepower and no ammo requirement are enough to cut down any 'Mech of its size or smaller throughout extended engagements. These weapons also produce a debilitating amount of heat that the 'Mech struggles to manage.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_TheGreatDebate_Textfield=[22582]Coming out of the Golden Century, many Clans believed that they were ready to fulfill Aleksandr Kerensky’s hidden hope that the Star League-in-Exile would one day return to the Inner Sphere. However, a debate raged between the individual Clans about whether they should return as liberators or conquerors. Forming a political divide between the Crusaders, who wished to invade the Inner Sphere and root out the corruption that led to centuries of death and destruction after the collapse of the Star League, and the Wardens, who believed that Kerensky intended the Clans to return as an enlightened people to offer independent protection against the greed of the House Lords and act as a guiding force for humanity.<cf><cf>In the year 3000, Clan Ghost Bear forced the matter to a vote with strong support from Clan Smoke Jaguar and Jade Falcon. But Clan Wolf successfully argued that the Clans were about to leap into an unknown situation with little reliable intelligence, having been so far removed from the Inner Sphere for centuries.<cf><cf>A compromise was formed between the Wardens and the Crusaders to send an advanced Clan force posing as Inner Sphere mercenaries tasked with working for each of the major political powers and reporting back all findings to the Clan body. For nearly twenty years, the Dragoons would report their findings on the readiness of each Great House to the Council. The intelligence was meant to break the deadlock and spur the Council into action but, in reality, all it accomplished was to further polarize the opinions of the various Clans along the Crusader/Warden political divide. Each side entrenched deeper into their ideology, leading to a never-ending deadlock over how the Children of Kerensky would eventually return to the Inner Sphere.<cf><cf>To this day, forty-eight years after the Dragoon Compromise was enacted, the Great Debate still rages on in the Clan Council. The Clans continue to look tirelessly for anything that would finally break the Council’s deadlock. So that the Clans may finally fulfill the Great Father’s dream of one day returning home.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_Mech_Spider_Textfield=[22583]Commissioned by the Star League in 2650 for use in Special Operations units, the Spider was not initially built in great quantities. With the destruction of its production facilities in 2776 the means and knowledge to produce the design went with them, and raiding for spare parts became commonplace. The chassis was revived by the Free Worlds League after its discover of the original design schematics from the ruins of the Terran Hegemony, and has since become a common sight on the fields of the Inner Sphere. Lightly armed but incredibly mobile, the Spider is an excellent scout 'Mech capable of jumping great heights.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Lore_SwordOfLight_Textfield=[22584]Considered the beating red heart of the DCMS and a symbol of the Combine's samurai elite, the flat-red 'Mechs of the Swords of Light regiments are known Sphere-wide as the embodiment of the Combine's will. With some of the most stringent enlistment requirements, those permitted to join the Sword of Light are held to impeccable standards on and off the battlefield. Those who serve the unit are considered to be living embodiments of the ideals of the Combine's Samurai culture. Thanks to its tenure and fame, the Sword of Light has access to top-of-the-line equipment and first dibs on any supplies the DCMS distributes to its armed forces. Unlike many other regiments in the Draconis Combine, the Sword of Light has its fleet of dropships and jumpships.<cf><cf>The Sword has no assigned territory but travels wherever the fight may be. As the flagship unit of the DCMS, the arrival of the Sword heralds the beginning of a large campaign. Whenever the Sword of Light operates alongside other DCMS forces, the leading officer of the Sword takes de facto command over the entire operation.
DigitalExtras_StringTable::Tro_WS_SovetskiiSoyuz_Textfield=[22585]Constructed by Blue Nose Clipperships of Mars, the 800-meter Sovetskii Soyuz was commissioned under General Rebecca Fedasa's New Arms Order of 2735 and introduced in 2742. An order that came down after Mother Jocasta Cameron assumed control of the Star League. Her predecessor allowed the SLDF to fall into neglect, with resources wasted on automated space-defense systems that would prove ineffective during the Amaris Coup. General Fedasa's declaration triggered large-scale upgrading of the SLDF's ships and weapons, and the Soyuz was one of the vessels created to fulfill that directive. Despite being classified as a heavy cruiser, the craft mounts such devastating offensive capabilities that many SLDF officers considered the WarShip a battlecruiser.
